cms:item.cms:title: Elected Members - Minutes, Agendas and Reports

cms:textAsset.cms:content:
Miscellaneous

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

The Council records and publishes all minutes, agendas and reports from Committee meetings.

By law, the Council must produce an accurate record of all decisions taken and recommendations made by the Council and its Committees and Panels. Depending on the type of committee or panel, minutes may be done in note form. For the quasi-judicial and decision-making committees and panels, they take the more traditional form.

The following list includes Minutes and Agendas of meetings, and Reports of Elected Members.

The documents are available to download. Alternatively, if you would like to receive a hard copy, please use the contact details above.
